game.name: We are Eva
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Play in multiple dimensions at the same time, traveling through them at will in this innovative 2D platformer that defies boundaries! I'm Eva, by the way, and I promise we'll have fun! Or maybe not... Maybe we'll both suffer horribly... How should I know? I'm just a video game character...
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play in multiple dimensions at the same time, traveling through them at will in this innovative 2D platformer that defies boundaries! I'm Eva, by the way, and I promise we'll have fun! Or maybe not... Maybe we'll both suffer horribly... How should I know? I'm just a video game character...

reviewHighlights.text: 적당히 할만한 퍼즐 + 플랫포머.... 인 줄 알았는데 저혈압 치료제 보라색을 도저히 못 참겠어서 결국 유기
